name: tm66
effect: Teaches Payback to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Payback to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user can use this attack after the foe, its power is doubled.
flavor_text.platinum: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user can use this attack after the foe, its power is doubled.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user can use this attack after the foe, its power is doubled.
